Who is MrBeast?
Jimmy Donaldson
How many subscribers does MrBeast have on YouTube?
131 million
What is the title of MrBeast's latest controversial video?
1,000 Blind People See for the First Time
What type of surgery does the video focus on?
A 10-minute surgery that treats blindness
What was the reaction of one woman who received surgery and $10,000?
She screamed and fell to the ground
What gift did MrBeast give to a man who missed driving?
A new Tesla
How many views did the controversial video receive?
76 million
What is MrBeast's goal regarding his money?
To give away all his money before he dies
What term does Steve Saylor use to describe videos that exploit disabled people's struggles?
